title: Issue 47 Scenario 2 Expected Behavior
content:
SCENARIO 2: Multiple Quick Tabs and Global Synchronization

EXPECTED BEHAVIOR:
- Multiple Quick Tabs can be created up to configured limit
- All Quick Tabs sync position, size, and state across tabs
- Closing a Quick Tab in one tab closes it in all tabs
- Global synchronization applies to all operations (create, update, delete)

TEST IMPLEMENTATION:
- Create 3 Quick Tabs on page 1
- Verify all 3 appear on page 2
- Close one Quick Tab from page 2
- Verify it's removed from page 1
- Tests bidirectional synchronization

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
- All Quick Tabs must sync globally
- Delete operations must propagate immediately
- No orphaned Quick Tabs after cross-tab deletion
